name: Tappy Plane (Oliva_Studio)
description:
Tappy Plane is a game Flappy Bird style where the characters will be of the planes! The goal is to avoid obstacles on your way, and make more possible stars, the more stars you get more you unlock characters!

Game features:

- The obstacles are generated randomly, creating a constantly changing path from the previous!

- Graphics created by Kenney (www.kenney.nl).

- 8 characters.

- 5 locations.

Good fun!!

Download:

- Google Play

-GameMaker: Player
